current_week.headline: Transfer Bonuses Explode, Amex Lounge Restrictions Incoming
current_week.summary: This week saw a surge in transfer bonuses across all major programs, but the big story is American Express's lounge access changes that will impact millions of cardholders starting March 1st.

top_stories.title: Amex Platinum Lounge Access Restricted
top_stories.summary: American Express announces major changes to Centurion Lounge access for Platinum cardholders starting March 1, 2026.
details: Platinum cardholders limited to 2 Centurion Lounge visits per year
Exception: Members with $75K+ annual spend retain unlimited access
Guest policy unchanged (2 guests when visiting)
top_stories.action: Consider Delta Reserve or other premium cards if lounges are critical

top_stories.title: Capital One 40% Avianca Bonus - Best of 2026
top_stories.summary: Capital One's 40% transfer bonus to Avianca LifeMiles is the highest we've seen this year.
details: 40% bonus on transfers to Avianca LifeMiles
No minimum or maximum transfer amount
Avianca is a Star Alliance partner
top_stories.action: Transfer NOW if you have planned Star Alliance redemptions

top_stories.title: Capital One Venture X Business Launches
top_stories.summary: Capital One enters the premium business card market with a compelling new offering.
details: 10X on hotels and rental cars through Capital One Travel
top_stories.action: Strong SUB for business owners with high spend
top_stories.comparison: More generous than Chase Ink Preferred for travel-focused businesses

trends.description: 7 active transfer bonuses across major programs - highest count in 18 months
Following Amex's lounge restrictions, expect other issuers to follow suit
New launches from Capital One and rumored Chase updates coming Q2
Post-pandemic capacity increases = more award seats on key routes

programs.name: United MileagePlus
programs.note: Dynamic pricing stabilizing, good Saver availability to Europe

programs.name: American AAdvantage
programs.note: Web Specials still strong, but off-peak awards eliminated

programs.name: Chase Ultimate Rewards
programs.note: 1.5X PYB categories expanded, transfer partners stable

programs.name: Marriott Bonvoy
programs.note: Category inflation continues, but peak/off-peak helps

programs.name: Avianca LifeMiles
programs.note: With 40% transfer bonuses, incredible Star Alliance value right now

looking_ahead.title: Next Week's Watch List
items: Potential Chase Sapphire Preferred increased SUB (rumored for late January)
IHG Point Breaks list refresh (usually mid-month)

community_highlights.achievement: Booked ANA First Class for $86 in taxes
Disney World for 5 people - $0 out of pocket
